amendment.description: To address bankruptcy filing fee increases, future reauthorizations, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2084 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2084 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Coons. (consideration: CR S2556; text: CR S2556) To address bankruptcy filing fee increases, future reauthorizations, and for other purposes.
